string-array.name: interrogative_question_passive
string-array.item: May you be insulted by you?
Can this be done by me?
Must the form be filled in by me?
Must it be done by some one?
Must our duties be done by us?
Should our country be loved by us?
Should our elders be respected by us?
Must the answer be written in ink by you?
Must the work be finished by you?
Should this question be raised now by you?
Should your parents be obeyed by you?
Have his clothes been stolen by a thief?
Was he laughed at by all his friends?
Has he been appointed captain by the teacher?
Are the accidents caused by carelessness?
Have we been invited by Geeta?
Will you be helped by Gouri Sen?
Have all the letters been written by him?
Has the poem been written by him?
Is a letter being written by him?
Are the poors being helped by him?
Is a book read everyday by him?
Was a pen bought by him?
Was a pen given to me by him?
Was a question asked by him?
Was a remarkable discovery made by him?
Are we taught English by him?
Was a new car being drove by him?
Is a letter being written by me?
Is an application going to be written by me?
Has the letter been posted by me?
Was letter written to the Headmaster by me?
Was he phoned yesterday by me?
Was that book written by me?
Was the coin given to her by me?
Will the lesson be learnt by me ?
Was a latter written to God by Leneho?
Is rice being cooked by mother?
Am I being taught English by Mr. Das?
Shall I be taught English next month by Mr. john?
Was a new car bought last month by Mr Saikia?
Is rice being cooked now by my aunt?
Was a letter written to the headmaster by my father?
Was a latter given to me by my friend?
Was an S. M. S. sent to me by my friend ?
Was this letter written by my friend?
Was the meeting presided over by our principle?
Are books bought every month by our teacher?
Is he called kalidas by people?
Was this school established in 1960 by people?
Was Ranghar built by pramatta Singha?
Are two sarees being bought by her?
Is good news expected by her?
Is cricket being played today by the boys?
Is cricket being played in the field by the boys?
Was the accident caused by the carelessness of the driver?
Is the patient being examined by the doctor?
Are the plants being watered by the gardener?
Was the bird killed by the girl?
Was a letter being written by the girl?
Was the tiger killed by the hunter?
Will a ticket be given to you by the manager?
Is the president selected by the members?
Was I shocked at the news?
Were the culprits arrested by the police?
Are the letters being delivered by the postman?
Are letters delivered every morning by the postman?
Were the letters being delivered by the post man?
Was he elected secretary by the students?
Was the programme organised by the students?
Was the stage decorated by the students?
Are our copies being corrected by the teacher?
Is a house being built by them?
Was he elected president by them?
Were many questions asked him by them?
Was I invited to the party by them?
Was the boy asked many questions by them?
Was he selected captain of our class by us?
Was he made captain by us?
Was he made captain of our team by us?
Was he made chairman of the committee by us?
Was the child made cry by us?
Was the matter discussed thoroughly by us?

string-array.name: interrogative_object_passive
string-array.item: By - The carelesness of the driver
